TermDefinition.DefinitionText: Cancer that forms in the tissues of the prostate (a gland in the male reproductive system that lies just below the bladder and in front of the rectum). Prostate cancer usually occurs in older men.

Prostate cancer; drawing shows cancer in one side of the prostate. Also shown are the bladder, rectum, and urethra.

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Cáncer que se forma en los tejidos de la próstata (glándula del aparato reproductor masculino que está debajo de la vejiga y en frente del recto). El cáncer de próstata se presenta, por lo general, en hombres de edad avanzada.
